principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Swiss Utility' clarity with 'Organic' warmth.
Density is Data: Use tight grids for logistics metrics, open space for marketing.
Tactile Feedback: Buttons should feel like physical switches (heavy shadows/borders on interaction).
Context Aware: High contrast for warehouse scanners, soothing dark mode for dispatchers.

dashboard_grid.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 md:gap-6 p-4 md:p-6
dashboard_grid.rules: Use col-span-2 or col-span-3 for main data tables. col-span-1 for summary metrics. Fill height.

landing_page.rules: Hero section must utilize 60/40 split with overlapping elements. Use large negative space.

mobile_scanner.rules: Viewfinder takes 60% height. Controls take 40%. Buttons must be min-height 56px.

inputs.default: h-11 rounded-md border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

badges.status_success: bg-green-100 text-green-800 dark:bg-green-900/30 dark:text-green-400 border border-green-200 dark:border-green-800
badges.status_warning: bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800 dark:bg-yellow-900/30 dark:text-yellow-400 border border-yellow-200 dark:border-yellow-800
badges.status_error: bg-red-100 text-red-800 dark:bg-red-900/30 dark:text-red-400 border border-red-200 dark:border-red-800

landing.structure: Navbar (transparent fixed) -> Hero (Full height, img bg, dark overlay) -> Features (Grid) -> Trust/Clients -> Footer
landing.hero_cta: Large primary button, heavy shadow. 'Start Shipping Now'.

dashboard.structure: Sidebar (Fixed left, collapsible) -> Header (Search, Profile, Theme Toggle) -> Main Content (Scrollable)
dashboard.widgets: Stats Cards (Row 1), Recent Shipments Table (Row 2 Col 1-3), Driver Status List (Row 2 Col 4)

scanner.structure: Header (Back btn, Flash toggle) -> Camera Viewfinder (Center square, scan line animation) -> Result Sheet (Slide up from bottom)
scanner.camera_sim: Use a grey/black placeholder div with a pulsing 'red line' animation to simulate scanning if camera API not active.

universal_guidelines: Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Do NOT use gradients for text.
All tables must use the 'Grid Border' style (border-b only for rows).
Mobile views must hide the Sidebar and use a bottom sheet or hamburger menu.
Theme toggle must persist state in localStorage.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update index.css with the provided CSS variables for Light/Dark mode.
2. Configure tailwind.config.js to use the 'class' strategy for dark mode.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar/Header structure for dashboard pages.
4. Implement the ThemeProvider using 'next-themes' or React Context.
5. Build the Mobile Scanner view using a simulated camera overlay (CSS animation) for the MVP.
6. Use the provided Image URLs for the Landing and Login pages.
